features: 【Powerful & Quick】With 110V and 970W, this portable travel iron effortlessly removes wrinkles and creases in clothes. It warms up in just 20 seconds, and you'll have wrinkle-free clothes in just 3 minutes, perfect for getting ready in no time.

【Precise & Versatile】Our mini steam iron features a triangular tip design that allows for 360° ironing, making it easy to tackle narrow areas like shirt buttons, plackets, and dress collars. Suitable for ironing a variety of fabrics, including organic fabrics, nylon blends, wool, cotton, linen, and more.

【Convenient & Efficient】This small handheld iron has a 100 ml integrated water tank that you can easily fill using the provided filling cup. The one-piece design prevents splashes, and you can always check the water level in the tank for added convenience.

【Versatile Ironing Options】Our steam iron for clothes offers both Dry and Wet Ironing in one device. It quickly heats up to 302°F, and with a simple button press, you can release a fine water mist for effective steam ironing. This hand held iron designed for both vertical and horizontal ironing, catering to different needs.

【Space-saving & Travel Size】The handle of this travel steam iron can be rotated at three angles (0°-90°-180°). It's compact, lightweight, and foldable, making it ideal for travel and outings. Easily pack it into suitcases or backpacks and carry it with you wherever you go.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portabble Steam iron for Clothes Suitcaseb for A Variety of Clothing
A Variety of Ironing Methods to Meet Your Needs!

Foldable Steam Iron Does not Take up Space IMPORTANT NOTICE Complete Preheating Required: Upon plugging in the power supply, I strongly recommend waiting for at least 20 seconds for the preheating process before pressing the steam button. This is crucial because the water needs to reach a certain temperature to convert into steam. If the steam button is pressed prematurely, the water might not have reached the appropriate temperature, resulting in high-pressure release of unatomized water, which is the primary cause of most leaks.Avoid Inverting the Product: During use, please refrain from completely turning the product upside down. After usage, ensure to pour out any excess water from the water tank to prevent water leakage through the water inlet when storing the product upside down.This product is designed for use with a 110V voltage standard. When traveling to countries with different voltage environments, make sure to bring a voltage converter to ensure a seamless user experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great! Good for Travel!
reviews.reviewText: It is small enough I can pack it for travel, works quick and well to remove wrinkles in clothes. It is heavier than I thought, but it feels substantial and made well. Good value, I’ll use it again and again for all my traveling moving forward!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: So far works great! I use it to steam my lab coat for work. Will note, a tank of water doesn’t last very long, but you can iron too. Compact design makes it easy to keep in my office and heat up in a minute or two and go! I’m not picky, this works perfectly for what I need it for.Loved the green/copper rose gold. Very pretty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Portable and light weight
reviews.reviewText: I travel for work and find that the iron in a hotel room is gross most of the time. I was looking for something small so it wouldn't take up much space in my suitcase but easy to use so that I might actually use it. This is perfect. It took a little bit to figure out the best way to steam the first shirt I tried but quickly got the hang of it (used it inside the shirt instead of outside). There is not temperature control and it did spit a little water intermittently but overall happy with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous little iron.
reviews.reviewText: Does a great job. Sure it takes longer than the big irons, but very nice for older women like myself. Lightweight and easier to iron with than a larger iron! Great for packing for trips!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: This is a great iron toTravel with. Heats up fast and does a wonderful job. It's very quiet.I love it !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for Travel
reviews.reviewText: This is an effective portable steam iron. It gets rid of all the wrinkles on my shirts so I take it with me wherever I go. I recently took it with me on a trip to Japan. They have 100 volt outlets and this iron is compatible. One thing I noticed is that the iron will not turn off the heat until it is actually unplugged. The button is merely to activate/deactivate the steam feature. Also, it is extremely hot after unplugging and a person can burn themself easily if they are not careful. To cool it off fast, I soak a washcloth in cold water and then press the iron’s hot metal surface onto the washcloth. This makes the process much faster to cool it down completely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not get hot. Does not steam.
reviews.reviewText: Does not get hot. Does not steam.It vibrates, which seems weird.This item does not work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great steamer but stopped working after 2 months
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this so I could take it with me on all my upcoming trips since it was so small and compact. It worked great, was easy to use and heated up pretty fast, but it stopped working and won’t heat up anymore and leaks.
It works well, satisfying to see wrinkles dissolve, easy to use, portable, light, cute.
The small but mighty iron takes very little space and the amount of steam it gives to iron. Any wrinkles out is quite astonishing. One of my best purchases yet.

Brought this to Taiwan when we went for a wedding and it was perfect, was so small and great for travel and worked perfectly on the day I used it on my dress, my boyfriends suit and shirts and then 4 of our friends used it for their stuff. Worked great on both iron function and steaming. My only complaint would be that the cord is a bit short so you need to have the garments very close the outlet which can be annoying.

reviews.reviewTitle: Omg where has this been all my life!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this little steamer!It says heats up in 20 secs but actually it heats up in like 2 seconds. Makes a big difference for someone like me who never has time in the morning to steam clothes before work.. I love that you can rotate the handle. I also tried both vertical and horizontal steaming and this works amazingly for both. The steamer is sturdy and well built. Doesn’t spit water. My clothes after steaming doesn’t feel damp or wet like what some steamers do. Lightweight and small enough to pack for travelingI tried many different small steamers and this beats even the expensive ones I was looking for something small because I didn’t want anything that would take too much space and just needed something for quick steaming.Can’t see how much water is left though but that’s ok, you’ll hear if it’s run out of water and you just refill it. You don’t lose any time since it heats up quick.Has a little pad that’s also sturdy where you rest it when you’re fussing with your garment. Still I turn it off every time I put it down on the pad but again, that’s no big deal since it heats back up right away soon as you press the buttonThe cord is short but not short enough to be annoying or make it non functional
Great for travelling, easy to use. Steam clothes long before you wear them because if they are still hot when you wear them they will re-wrinkle.
